name: Review and approve joint application (OTHER APPLICANT REPRESENTED)
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

A solicitor has created ((isDivorce??a divorce application)) for your ((partner)). Their solicitor is called ((solicitor firm)). 

The solicitor has indicated that you and your ((partner)) want to submit the application jointly. That means you will be applying ((isDivorce??for the divorce))((isDissolution??to end the civil partnership)) together. 

If you want to join this application you need to review and confirm the information by ((date of response)). 

1. Create your ((isDivorce??divorce account))((isDissolution??account to end your civil partnership)) and sign in ((create account link))
2. Enter your unique reference number: ((reference number))
2. Enter your access code: ((access code))

If you do not want to join the application, then you can either ignore this notification or contact your ((partner)) or their solicitor. 

If you do not join this application then your ((partner)) or their solicitor can still submit a sole application. This would mean you would have to respond to ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end the civil partnership)) instead of joining it. You can also make a sole application, if you want.

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
